body: When you do a monthly donation, will you pay the monthly fee until you have paid the full price which you would pay all at once. Like Gold is $25 would you pay $5 dollars for 5 months?
body_tagged: When you do a monthly donation, will you pay the monthly fee until you have paid the full price which you would pay all at once. Like Gold is $25 would you pay $5 dollars for 5 months?
title: Donations

replies.body: So would pay $5 dollars for ever and would you be able to stop the subscription?
replies.body_tagged: So would pay $5 dollars for ever and would you be able to stop the subscription?

replies.body: Yes, you can stop the subscription at any time through PayPal.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, you can stop the subscription at any time through PayPal.

replies.body: does it last forever like before if you pay in full
replies.body_tagged: does it last forever like before if you pay in full

replies.body: It does keller. For example, Gold is $5 a month, and $25 as a one-time payment.
replies.body_tagged: It does keller. For example, Gold is $5 a month, and $25 as a one-time payment.

reply_to.body:
look I know this is the wrong group to chat about my ban but what can I do to get unbanned? You have no idea how much I want to go to this server, yeah I know you dont care but please loook at it from my point of view, I have been banned for months. can you just tempban me if you want for like a month or something. Please not a permanent ban. That is longer then five years. What if I still want to join in five years but I can't because Iv'e been banned for what I think no reason and the people I tell, they think it was not worth a permanent ban. So please tell me how to get unbanned.





Oh and I don't know why you don't believe me. Please tell me why you don't believe my "Story"

replies.body: Why does your other account have the same name then but without any "_"
replies.body_tagged: Why does your other account have the same name then but without any "_"

reply_to.body: I wasnt advertising, my dumb brother got on my computer and changed my account info to get himself unbanned, we share the same computer. He asked a mod to unban his other account so he wouldnt have to use mine. so he checked the Ip's and saw it was the same ip so he thinks I had two accounts and that I tried to get myself unbannd. I played on this server with my account like half the time, he was on it for basicly the other half. I have been banned for sooo long and I woud like to finally be unbanned.
